about_the_game:
Note: Project files for this application can be found on GitHub for free. Buying this product funds my academic goals and future projects like this (hopefully even more robust). I'm interested in making art and game development tools as I continue to grow my skill set.

Pixel Puppet is a powerful yet easy-to-use pixel art creation tool, perfect for artists, hobbyists, and game developers. Whether crafting retro-style game assets or experimenting with pixel art, Pixel Puppet provides everything you need to bring your creations to life.

  • Multiple Brush Types: Choose from various brushes, including normal, spray, and square, each with adjustable sizes to suit your artistic needs.

  • Resizable Canvas: You can start with any canvas size and easily adjust it to your project requirements at any time.

  • Color Palette: Pick colors effortlessly using the built-in color picker and create unique palettes for your projects.

  • Layer Support: Work non-destructively with multiple layers. Add, remove, and rearrange layers with ease, allowing for greater flexibility and creativity.

  • Import and Export: Seamlessly import existing PNG or JPG files to continue your work and export your creations in high-quality PNG or JPG formats.

  • Easy-to-Use Interface: Enjoy a clean, intuitive interface that makes pixel art creation accessible to beginners while providing the depth that experienced artists need.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Intel i3 (or equivalent) dual-core processor, 2GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated GPU (Intel HD Graphics 4000 or equivalent)
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Intel 15 (or AMD Ryzen 5) quad-core processor, 3 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU, NVIDIA GTX 1050 or AMD Radeon RX 560 or newer
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Whether you're creating sprites, backgrounds, or entire worlds, Pixel Puppet is your ideal companion for pixel art. Get ready to unleash your creativity!
